title: Flash FX Lightning Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 10 Lightning sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/F0Qs4_6kniw


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 24 FPS 


Texture Resolutions:


● Electric 01_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Electric 02_#[512,288].png 1536x1440

● Electric 03_#[512,288].png 1024x1152

● Electric 04_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Electric 05_#[512,288].png 1536x1440

● Electric 06_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Electric 07_#[512,288].png 1024x1152

● Electric 08_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Electric 09_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Electric 10_#[512,288].png 1024x1152


Number of Textures: 10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
